tit.e: Tanetsuna KUTSUKI (the lord of the domain of Fukuchiyama)
Tanetsuna KUTSUKI (the lord of Fukuchiyama Domain)
Tanetsuna KUTSUKI (the lord of Fukuchiyama Domain)

sen.j: 朽木 稙綱（くつき たねつな）は、丹波国福知山藩の第3代藩主。
sen.e: Tanetsuna KUTSUKI was the third lord of Fukuchiyama domain in Tanba Province.
Tanetsuna KUTSUKI was the third lord of Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.
Tanetsuna KUTSUKI was the third lord of Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.
He was the fourth load of the Kutsuki family in Fukuchiyama domain.
He was the fourth load of the Kutsuki family in Fukuchiyama Domain.
He was the fourth load of the Kutsuki family in Fukuchiyama Domain.

sen.j: 宝永7年（1710年）11月21日、第2代藩主・朽木稙元の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born on January 9, 1171 as the first son of Tanemoto KUTSUKI, the second lord of domain.
He was born on January 9, 1171 as the first son of Tanemoto KUTSUKI, the second lord of domain.
He was born on January 9, 1171 as the first son of Tanemoto KUTSUKI, the second lord of domain.

sen.j: 享保6年（1721年）に父が死去したため、家督を継いで第3代藩主となる。
sen.e: Because his father died in 1721, he took over as head of the family to become the third lord of domain.
Because his father died in 1721, he took over as head of the family to become the third lord of domain.
Because his father died in 1721, he took over as head of the family to become the third lord of domain.
He died on June 4, 1726.
He died on June 4, 1726.
He died on June 4, 1726.
His age at death was 17.
His age at death was 17.
His age at death was 17.

sen.j: 子がなかったため、後を叔父の朽木稙治が継いだ。
sen.e: Because he had no children, his uncle Taneharu KUTSUKI succeeded him.
Because he had no children, his uncle Taneharu KUTSUKI succeeded him.
